评论详情: Upon receiving this I could tell by the package it wasn't new. I opened the plastic bag and the arm pits had white deodorant stains. Also there was hair throughout the dress. DISGUSTING I'm all about reusing stuff if I choose to purchase used. Please do better!
Fit is flexible and worked perfect with my corset and was the perfect dress base for my costume! Actually won first place on two costume parties.

评论概述: Great dress for ren fest and the like
评论详情: My kiddo and I have been enjoying Renaissance festivals for several years. Several years ago she surprised me by asking about dressing up for them. I was delighted being an ex theater nerd myself so that was right up my street. Anyways this is the second ren fest dress I've gotten her as she outgrew the first one. She loves the style of this dress it's a bit fairy princess with it's long sleeves and busy bunching and such, and the vibrant red color. The fabric is comfortable (I'm told) even on hotter days. It's reasonably priced and a good value, and will last several years until she outgrows it. It works well and looks good with her other ren fest garb accessories (double ring belt, belt bag, flowered headdress). It does have a bit of a tendency to wrinkle and hold onto wrinkles. Oh well, nothin's perfect I guess.

Bought this amazing dress to be the White Queen for Halloween. The dress is stunning and extremely comfortable. I was a little skeptical but IT WORTH IT! Great quality and can definitely wear elsewhere
The sleeves drag the ground. It’s cotton, so it can be easily washed. The design leaves a lot to be desired. It fit me fine.

I purchased this dress to help me create Christine Daae for a Halloween party. It was a hit. Reasonably priced and was a success but I wasn’t the biggest fan of the material and it required a bit of ironing on arrival. Great as a costume.

评论概述: Looked great, fit good and was perfect.
评论详情: This dress is so cute. It fit well and was very well made. Loved this dress..

评论概述: Exactly as described, a little shorter than I'd like
评论详情: This fits well and was great for part of my Renaissance Fair costume. It was comfortable and breathable on a hot day despite all the nice layers. I'm 5'9.5" and would have loved it to be 1-2" longer.

Fit is very flexible for all sizes. The color is accurate. Layers help hide the safety pins I used to shorten the dress because of the mud. I’m short and the sleeves were long, so I hemmed the sleeves.  The dress washed very well and still looks great

This was the best dress! I am 4’11 and 145lbs and usually wear a size 8 or 10 dress and the s/m for perfect. There is a ton of stretch to it. The fabric can be described as like bed sheet material which kind of threw me off but it ended up looking and feeling great. If you are a short girlie the length works, not too long at all!

评论概述: "O k, but not real decided yet!"
评论详情: Not as pleased as I thought I'd b e, it's o k? I guess, nothing special to say about this item...I think it's a little too Renaissance  for this Princess!
I bought this dress for my elven cosplay and was not disappointed! This dress fit me very well and was not scratchy. The chest area is very sheer however, so I’d recommend buying pasties as well.

Dress worked nicely for my Halloween costume. Came pretty wrinkled but the garment steamer made quick work of that. It is stretchy in the bodice and just the right length (I’m 5’6”). Price is fair (not cheap but not expensive either). Can use for many types of costumes. I definitely recommend.
Dress is so comfortable, elastic is not itchy and so versatile for any event.

I bought this as a last minute outfit base for a local rennaissance faire I attend every year. Upon ordering it, I was expecting the material to be more on the cheap side, but when I received it, I was pleasantly surprised. While yes, the fabric is a little sheer towards the bottom of the dress, that can easily be fixed by wearing some leggings underneath. It's a very comfortable dress, and the neckline is stretchy enough so that you can wear the sleeves on or off the shoulder. I'm very happy with this dress, and I would buy it again!
It’s so pretty on, even without a corset, and the material is nice. Not particularly soft but breathable and medium weight but loose and flowy.
I really wanted this to work, but the arms and shoulder area was just too tight, and I had to send it back.

I never know if clothes on Amazon will fit me because I'm always between sizes. But I read reviews and got the 2xl/3xl . I normally wear 2xl/18 dresses. So, I was a little nervous buying this last minute for Halloween. But, I love it! It fit perfectly! It was loose where it needed to be. It was fitted where it needed to be. And it flowed nicely. I especially love the long fabric hanging from the sleves. The fabric wasn't as cheap as I expected. I'm 5'9" and it was long enough! If I ever have a reason to get this dress again in a different color, I'll definitely get more! It came SUPER compact and wrinkled. There was no time to wash and hang dry (hand wash or gentle cycle only...no instructions on if it needs to hang dry or it is ok to put in the dryer). So, I misted it with water and hung it up overnight. Then fluffed it in the dryer on low heat for 10 minutes before I put it on. The wrinkles came out well enough. Everybody loved it! Idk exactly what you call my "costume". But I paired it with a cute crown and necklace. I felt pretty in it and not self conscious about my weight. 10/10 recommend.
Will be a great costume! Fits well.
So hard to find cotton, am happy. However is see-through so um...
My daughter (age 13) wanted to be a "crow sorceress/princess" for Halloween and this was perfect!  She was prancing around wearing it and felt very pretty.  It looks great and not cheap at all!
Fits perfect!!! Definitely wanna buy other ones in different colors. So excited to wear this for Halloween!!
Wore this dress to a Ren Faire wedding.  The color is gorgeous and the dress is a great value for the very reasonable price.
Great for a base to my Bride of Frankenstein costume
Love this dress!  Fits perfectly and looks good!

The material is a little thin which is nice because I live in vegas and it’s hot but it rips easily and I already snagged it and tore a whole in the skirt. As far as what I needed it checked the boxes, I just needed a starter piece for ren faire and this is a perfect base for a corset and an overcoat or I can tie it up and make it into a pirate dress easily. I ordered the same size I normally get and it fit me like I wanted so if you like it a little bigger or smaller size up or down accordingly. I don’t have a large chest so anyone who does might have a different opinion about how comfortable it is but I liked it quite well.
Ordered a l/xl that fits.like a m
I am plus size and it fit perfectly. After a wash and an ironing it will be perfect.

评论概述: I am absolutely in love with this dress
评论详情: This dress is so comfortable, lightweight, easy to wear, and really beautiful. Perfect for your Renaissance Faire needs! Excellent value for the price, and very flattering!

评论概述: Item appears exactly as described and shown on the sellers pics.
评论详情: I will be adding embellishments to make a renaissance queen costume, and I am very satisfied with the style. The weight of the fabric will not be affected when I add stuff to it. It will maintain the shape in style, and I love the appearance and the color.

The dress fit perfectly and looks really good. I am a short 5'1" but in the picture I have boots with a heel and platform on.  The part of the sleeve that hangs down was a little long and dragged on the ground. Every once in awhile it got stepped on. But...I am short!  The quality of the material is good. The bottom skirt is a bit sheer but the overskirt mostly covers that.  It depends on how you wear it. It does make it a little cooler to wear in the midday hot sun.  I am really happy with this purchase. I can make it into a few different style costumes for Renn Faires or Pirate Faires...etc...  I would highly recommend this dress.

exactly like the photos, loved it for my renaissance festival. it weight wasn’t too heavy and it fit very flatteringly. in the beaming sun of the festival i was never suffocated by the dress, however it had a strange texture that didn’t upset me much through the day. i’d say it’s worth it
Great quality, a bit transparent but great for warm weather
It was polyester but advertised as cotton

So happy with this purchase! It's so hard to find 100% cotton! This dress is perfect for Renissance faires. I'm in the process of buying one in each color! I wish there was the option to not have the long pieces on the sleeves. I had to rip the seams and sew the sleeves. The dress is quality! The long pieces on the sleeves won't work for my job at the mead booth! BUY!!

I ordered it in peacock blue. The label even said it was the right color but I got white. The night before my event I had to dye the dress because I didn’t have time to order anything else. I ordered large/xlarge and honestly could have gone up a size. I’m 5’9 and 150lbs. It still fit but wearing the dress off the shoulders the elastic was a little tight on the arms. Being tall the dress hit the at the calves so I added a piece of fabric so that it looked like it was floor length in the back.

I have a black version of this dress and love it. Ordered a white one for the summer renaissance faire. Arrived quickly, and is exactly what I ordered. It is pretty sheer, but I was expecting that and plan to layer. The sleeve tails are really long, I trim mine but if you like them long it's a fun feature.
I was worried it wasn’t going to fit but it turned out great!!

The dress came in and it is completely see-through and transparent. So if you want it as a layering set whatever but if not be aware that you need things under it or all will be seen if you catch my drift. Size was fine just not a good material choice.
I wore this to the renaissance festival and I loved it. The material is good and breathable. I felt sexy in it. And I want more in different colors lol definitely a good purchase
It’s beautiful and elegant but it’s definitely see through. If it was thicker it would be a 5 star review. I bartend at the Renaissance fair and I’m interested to see how it holds up.

评论概述: the material is good quality, but its too small
评论详情: its absolutely beautiful, but the sizing listed was way too small.
It's very wrinkled but it should do fine once ironed out or thrown in the dryer. I love the softness and style of the dress overall. It's also long enough! Which is great because I'm tall.

I'm absolutely thrilled with this dress for my ren-faire adventures! It's a stunning addition to my wardrobe, boasting beautiful craftsmanship and a sturdy design. The fabric is durable and comfortable, perfect for wandering the faire grounds all day without worry. The charming details and unique style make me feel like a character straight out of a fairy tale. While I did have to make a few minor adjustments for the perfect fit, I am 4'11", once tailored, it was worth it. If you're searching for a dress that brings joy and enchantment to your Ren Faire experience, look no further than this delightful piece!
Love the material. I can’t wait to wear it. I live in Florida so cotton is a must!

The dress itsself is very light and comfortable. Beautiful design. However, it is about 4" longer than I expected and will take some alteration to make it wearable without posing a tripping hazard. I am 5'4
Came super fast and fits just as expected! It’s so pretty and will definitely be my new “dramatic lounging” dress!

评论概述: Perfect if you dress an Mary Sanderson for Halloween!
评论详情: This was very comfortable to wear and the top is super stretchy for big yabo's as Dani from Hocus Pocus would say. I'm 40 DD, weigh 178lbs and stand 5'4". I was not tripping over the bottom of the dress. It is nice and made well. I will be wearing this every year for Halloween as Mary Sanderson.
Very nice undergown.  Super fast shipping
Paired this with a green corset and over skirt for Christmas. It was tight around the arms at first but didn’t end up being uncomfortable. I might buy in cream next.

评论用户: My coconut oil came broke and leaking. I'm not happy about this what so ever. It says I cannot replace it return item. If they don't fix this I won't be buying from them again
评论详情: It's beautiful and fits to size. Not exactly great for a masquerade ball.
This dress design provided a nice ethereal look for my costume, but the lovely blue color and the fabric underscored even more.  Very feminine!  A true value for the price.
I love this dress! Its exactly as pictured. Fits true to size. Shipped quickly.

评论概述: Really nice dress for the right festival/holiday
评论详情: I bought this for Halloween and it fit perfectly. It also wasn’t as sheer as I feared. Will use this for other festivals. Very happy with the purchase.  It runs long and fits true to size.
I ordered this dress for my wedding dress and it looked perfect!!! It fit me perfectly and was cool in the Alabama weather. The top is see through so I would prepare to have something go under it.

Love this dress as the base layer for my pirate costume. Super comfortable and light, wasn’t itchy or uncomfortable even when the corset was on over it. I pinned one side up slightly in the front to show some leg/fishnets. Love the sleeves and the whole shape of the outfit.

I love the fit of this dress! I used it for a costume party where i dressed as a vampire. I am a bigger girl so i was a bit skeptical of how it would fit. It fit like a glove and hugs in all the right places. I felt so majestic in it. My mom already claimed it for next years costume because she loved the look of it so much. The layering is very well done. I could not believe the value I got it for. I was expecting to pay much more. It did have a vinegary smell to it right out of the package. But that went away when I washed it. I would suggest handwashing it because it slightly ripped under the arm part due to the fabric wrapping around the center part of my washer. It was a small tear that was not visible so I wore it as usual. I am planning to rewear this dress for a Stevie Nick's costume next year. Although it would be nice for a Ren fair if you wanted to.

The fabric feels nice and sturdy, not like a costume fabric at all, it is a little see through but nothing crazy. I was iffy on ordering the 3x because I'm typically a 2x and I think I made the right choice.
I love this so much I think I'll get married in it

I am nearly 5'10", and weigh about 300 lbs. I wear a plus size 26, have a small bust, relatively thick waist, and no shortage of booty. The 3x in this dress from this seller fits me PERFECTLY! I actually purchased this dress and the visually identical dress from another seller on Amazon. The dresses are very similar upon comparison, however, this is the one I'm keeping. Overall it is about 1 inch longer, and the sleeves are slightly larger which accommodates my larger-than-average arms. Not sure if the difference is consistent between the 2 sellers or if I just got lucky with whichever seamstress made this one, but I'm ecstatic in either case. I purchased this - along with a collar, cape, and a fabulous under-bust corset by Daisy - to be a Victorian vampire, but I can see this dress being on standby for tons of other future costumes. Definitely the best purchase I've made in a long time! Super excited to wear it for Halloween.
It was perfect very light weight and did what it was supposed to for my shoot looks better in person
The dress is very comfortable and flows nicely. It fits as expected and is quite flattering.

(I ordered the white plain dress) Incredibly flattering on me, material feels nice but is very thin and see through, was wearing a white bra and you could even see that. I plan on dying it brown/ tan so maybe that will help. Not to worried because I have a corset for the top. Sizing seems pretty accurate. For the price I wish it wasn’t see through other then that no complaints

评论概述: Not very soft, came very wrinkly
评论详情: The material isn't very soft even though it claims to be cotton. It sounds like paper when you try to fold it. Also, the proportions of the actual dress don't look as good as in the photo. The piece that's dangling in the front of the dress isn't actually that long, so it ends up looking weird. It's very very wrinkly and I can't even get out all the wrinkles with steamer and multiple washes. It is kind of cute but I don't think the quality is worth what they're charging for.

评论概述: Very flattering, perfect for your renaissance or witchy outing
评论详情: This was a much higher quality dress than I expected!  Although I could have fit into a smaller size (I usually wear an XL), I opted for the XXL/3XL and I'm glad I did because I'm 5'8" and wanted to ensure the dress was long enough.  It was perfect!  Paired with an under bust corset it was still down to my ankles.  The dress holds to the body nicely without anything slipping or falling down due to the nice range of stretch in the design, it's soooooo comfortable.  Yes as others reported, it was very wrinkled when I received it. I washed it on a gentle machine cycle with other clothes, and hung it to dry.  This took care of all the wrinkles and did not need ironing.  You won't be sorry you purchased this dress!

Looks great, fits great. However, I didn't realize this was a SHEIN product, which means a few things. One: the "soft and breathable" material is plastic- which I'll admit, makes the dress hold its plush shape REALLY well. Two: if you're opposed to SHEIN products, I don't recommend buying from this seller, as that just continues the cycle of keeping SHEIN in business. On the other end of the spectrum, if you have no qualms about buying SHEIN products, you're likely paying twice the price here. I haven't checked, though. Three: I'll stand by the stars I give it because it's absolutely perfect for what I need and it looks really damn good.

评论概述: It fits beautifully, the fabric is good and it fits as expected
评论详情: Good

评论概述: Fits well, but a bit see through.
评论详情: It’s a beautiful dress and fits well. The only issue I have with it is that the material is quite see-through. They add a extra panel of cloth on the front chest area but it is not enough and looks strange when the material transitions to the stomach area. Find something white to put underneath it, or maybe find a different dress.

评论概述: Nice but I wish fabric was not so wrinkled
评论详情: The dress fits well, generous cut.  I plan to wear it for a Goddess Gala event, as a Woodland Queen.  The dress is not permanent press cotton, it is the type of cotton that you will have to iron before you can wear it.  I would have given it a 5 star, but it is terribly wrinkled.  I tossed it in the dryer damp, with a heavy towel, and tumbling it too about half of the wrinkles out.  Still I will spend an hour ironing it, if I want it to look nice.

It’s so comfortable and beautiful! It’s kinda see through so maybe wear a white bra and panty but for me it’s not that noticeable. It looks like I crawled out of a Florence+The Machine album cover (or someone’s TV screen 💀) but all in all it’s such a beautiful dress and I plan on keeping it for my wedding in the future 💕

This dress is quite lovely, and was perfect for my Renaissance themed outfit. The purple color is much brighter in real life, but photographs beautifully. The long trailing sleeves are ridiculous and I love them. I layered another light purple skirt between the handkerchief upper layer and the ruffled under layer, and it really gave the dress some more depth and volume. Dress arrived super wrinkled, but I tossed it in the dryer on a steam setting and it really helped. I should have ironed it a bit, but I didn't have time. Still looked great though! I typically wear a size small, and the size small/medium fit great! The fabric is comfortable and was pleasant to wear all night. I'm very happy with this purchase- I'm tempted to buy more in every color!
Love the color the fit and fabric is perfect
Better than expected.
I absolutely LOVE this dress. It is well made and also, VERY flattering. I highly recommend this dress!

评论概述: Wow! Better quality than I expected
评论详情: I didn't have high hopes for this dress, as most costumes are barely sewn together. But I was in a hurry, so much so that one of my criteria was delivers by tomorrow. So I ended up with this one. It greatly exceeded my expectations. the fit is great. The cut is generous, it works true to size even though my waist area is ... challenging. Usually I size up but I did not. The dress looks nice on, fabric feels good, and it's not overly long for my 5'3" frame.

First off I love this dress. Very comfortable and flattering. I was worried about washing it (material was a bit suspect at first) thought it might fall apart or shrink really bad. However I washed it on gentle and hung to dry. Looks great! I don’t think it shrunk at all. That said I did order the 3x (normally wear a 14). Usually order up because of length. This fits me perfectly and stretches quite a bit so I do believe it would fit a larger size. I believe this dress to be a good value.

评论概述: Made for a perfect Bride of Frankenstein Costume!

评论详情: Ordered this last minute for a local ren faire. Fit amazingly. I'm a standard 2X with a muffin belly. This dress increased the look of the bust and decreased the look of the belly even before I put a corset on. I did have to trim the length of the sleeve just because it got annoying after a while.
Beautiful dress. Nice layers, light fabric with good volume without dress being heavy. Highly recommend.

This dress is absolutely beautiful and so flattening. I received it today and decided to try it on. Oh. My. Gosh! I absolutely love it!!!!! I will definitely be purchasing it in the purple and wine color. This go around I purchased the green. Love it!!!! If you are on the fence about purchasing, don’t be. You won’t be sorry
Get for Halloween costume.  Love it!
This item fit my daughter perfectly! She order to wear to a renaissance festival
Loved the dress overall. Fit true to size.
Loved this, very flattering.  Great for Ren Faires, Halloween, or just cuz.

I like the silhouette but my only qualm would be how thin the clothing is, it's completely see-through. I had to wear white shorts and a white tank top to combat this problem.  It comes out of the package very wrinkly and it's hard to get the wrinkles out even with ironing and steaming. I used it as a Christine costume but I will use it for another costume like an elf in the future.

I'm not convinced that this is the best value for money. The material is very badly creased in every way possible, It does not wear as the picture depicts it. Shame. This was close to $100. It should have been a higher quality material. It says soft wearing, it definitely is not.
Looked exactly like the image

came iN a timely manner. packaged well. not a lot of loose threads. no marks or smears. i assumed it's new since it has that manufacturing smell. cloth is very thin and sheer, so make sure you have something to cover your nips for the top half, bottom half has another layer which is good enough to cover. overall it has a good design.  make sure your sleeves are on your lap when you sit or you will have dirty edges. im wearing a petticoat, slip, undercoat, underskirt, or crinoline to give the nice volume. if you don't have one then it will just look flat, but that wasn't what i was going for. im a 5'1 with a 35in heel so it will touch the floor if i didn't wear heels. so far i didn't have to alter anything. you will also have to steam the dress bec you will have loads of lines if you don't.  would buy if again.

The dress itself is beautiful, lightweight and easy to wash. It's a little see through and I wore leggings and a tank top underneath. The sleeves are really long and I ended up catching them a couple times. All in all it's a beautiful dress and I am happy with the purchase.
Good fit in X-XL for size 18 .This wine dress looks even better with black petticoat
